Directions

This simulation models a single-effect evaporator with a steam jacketed feed heater and manual catch-and-weigh outlet measurement. Use the setpoint displays to control the feed temperature and flowrate, and hover over the evaporator and analog gauges to monitor. Click the three-way ball valves to control flow to scales or the drain. Click the button on either scale to empty the bucket and tare. Scroll to zoom and drag the screen to pan.

About

This digital experiment was created in the Department of Chemical and Biological Engineering at University of Colorado Boulder for LearnChemE.com by Drew Smith under the direction of Professor John L. Falconer and Michelle Medlin. It is based on a browser-based simulation by Neil Hendren at the University of Colorado Boulder. It was prepared with financial support from the National Science Foundation (DUE 2336987 and 2336988) in collaboration with Washington State University. Address any questions or comments to LearnChemE@gmail.com.
